name: LRCTools
short_description:
LRCTools is a set of primitive command line tools that allows you to create LRC lyrics from text file, manipulate lyrics time offset, and convert LRC lyrics to SRT subtitle file for using in any media player that supports only SRT format.

These tools are written in Perl, thus runs on any platform that Perl interpreter is available.
Only plain LRC file (ones with no information header) are supported.
summary: Poor man's command line tools to sync and convert LRC lyrics file
